Home/ Services/ Business/ Business Permits & Licensing
Business

Business Permits & Licensing Section

New business permits, renewals, Mayor's clearance, and other business-related permits

Office

Mayor's Office - BPLS

Location

Municipal Hall

Hours

8AM - 5PM

Renewal

Jan 1 - Jan 20

Business Permit Services

Select a service to view the detailed process and requirements

Issuance of New Business Permit

Application for new business permit for businesses operating in Solano

Requirements for New Business

  • Duly accomplished Application Form
  • DTI Certificate of Business Name Registration (for sole proprietorship)
  • SEC Registration (for corporation/partnership)
  • CDA Registration (for cooperatives)
  • Barangay Business Clearance
  • Zoning Clearance from MPDO
  • Sanitary Permit from MHO
  • Fire Safety Inspection Certificate from BFP
  • Locational Clearance (if applicable)
  • Contract of Lease / Land Title (proof of business location)
  • Community Tax Certificate (Cedula)
  • Valid ID of owner/authorized representative
StepActivityDocumentsDurationPersonnel
1Submit application form and complete requirementsApplication form, all requirements10 minutesBPLS Staff
2Verification and assessment of documents—15-30 minutesBPLS Staff
3Computation of fees and taxesAssessment sheet10 minutesBPLS Staff
4Payment of fees at Treasurer's OfficeOrder of Payment10 minutesTreasurer's Office
5Issuance of Business PermitOfficial Receipt10 minutesBPLS Staff

Processing Information

  • Total processing time: 55 minutes to 1 hour (if complete)
  • Fees vary based on business type, capitalization, and floor area

Renewal of Business Permit

Annual renewal of existing business permit (January 1-20 without surcharge)

Requirements for Renewal

  • Previous year's Business Permit
  • Barangay Business Clearance (current year)
  • Sanitary Permit from MHO (current year)
  • Fire Safety Inspection Certificate from BFP (current year)
  • Community Tax Certificate (Cedula)
  • Sworn Statement of Gross Sales/Receipts
  • Financial Statements (for corporations)
StepActivityDocumentsDurationPersonnel
1Submit renewal application and requirementsPrevious permit, clearances5 minutesBPLS Staff
2Verification and assessmentGross sales declaration10 minutesBPLS Staff
3Payment of fees at Treasurer's OfficeOrder of Payment10 minutesTreasurer's Office
4Issuance of renewed Business PermitOfficial Receipt5 minutesBPLS Staff
Renewal PeriodSurcharge
January 1-20No Surcharge
January 21 onwards25% Surcharge + 2% Interest/month

Issuance of Mayor's Clearance/Permit

Mayor's clearance for various purposes including employment, travel, and other transactions

For Employment

  • Barangay Clearance
  • Police Clearance
  • NBI Clearance
  • Community Tax Certificate (Cedula)
  • 2x2 ID Photo
  • Valid ID

For Other Purposes

  • Barangay Clearance
  • Community Tax Certificate (Cedula)
  • Valid ID
  • Supporting documents (as applicable)
StepActivityDurationPersonnel
1Submit requirements and fill out application form5 minutesBPLS Staff
2Verification of documents5 minutesBPLS Staff
3Payment of fee at Treasurer's Office5 minutesTreasurer's Office
4Issuance of Mayor's Clearance5 minutesBPLS Staff
Type of ClearanceFee
Mayor's Clearance (Employment)₱50.00
Mayor's Clearance (Other purposes)₱30.00

Other Permits and Clearances

Additional permits and clearances issued by the Mayor's Office

Delivery Permit

  • Request letter
  • Business Permit of supplier
  • Vehicle registration (OR/CR)
  • Driver's License

Special Permit (Events)

  • Request letter stating purpose
  • Barangay Clearance
  • Valid ID of applicant
  • List of activities/program

Closure of Business

  • Affidavit of Closure
  • Original Business Permit
  • Tax Clearance from Treasurer
  • BIR Certificate of Closure

Transfer of Business Location

  • Letter of Intent
  • Current Business Permit
  • New Barangay Clearance
  • New Zoning Clearance
Permit TypeFeeProcessing Time
Delivery Permit₱100.00Same day
Special Permit (Events)₱200.00 - ₱500.001-3 days
Business Closure Certificate₱100.00Same day
Transfer of Location₱200.001-2 days

Office Personnel

Key personnel handling business permits and licensing

BPLS Head

Section Chief

Licensing Officer

Permit Processing

Administrative Staff

Records & Assessment

Office Information

  • Business Permits & Licensing Section, Municipal Hall, Solano, Nueva Vizcaya
  • Monday - Friday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM
  • (078) 326-5001

Important Notes

  • Business permit renewal deadline: January 20
  • Late renewal incurs 25% surcharge + 2% monthly interest
  • All clearances must be current year
  • Bring original documents for verification
